title: Client not launching
body: My client tries to open and it looks like it is trying to update but the bar beneath the League of Legends logo gets halfway and then the logo closes.

replies.body: yes, never had this issue before
I just disabled it, and my game launched... Fail. Thanks man!

That works for now, if it comes back, here is what to do:

1) Launch Avast! UI
2) Go to scan->scan for viruses
3) At the bottom there is a 'quarantine'
4) Select the last "Lol\*ux\*" file and hit "restore and add to exclusions"
5) Close Avast! UI
6) Start LoL.

NOTE: \* is a wildcard and not a literal string. For example, LolUpdateUx.exe would match.
Was having the same problem and this worked. Thanks!
thanks, had the same problem and this fixed it! your a saint!
I tried disabling it and still nothing.  Any idea?
This made me so happy. finally a fix.
